Interface GhostInterface


  • public interface GhostInterface
    Ghosts must extend Actor and implement this interface.
    Since:
    2013-02-24

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eaten()
      Called when the ghost is eaten by a Pac-Man You should remove yourself from the grid (if you haven't already), indicate that you've died, and add yourself back to the GhostArea
      void initializeGhost(GhostArea ghostArea, MyStats stats, java.awt.Color myColor)
      Called after class creation to initialize a Ghost.
      void start(info.gridworld.grid.Grid<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> grid, info.gridworld.grid.Location start)
      This method is called when this Ghost should enter the Maze.
      void superPacMan(boolean start)
      Called when any Pac-Man eats a PowerPellet Ghosts should set their color to BLUE when a pacman is super and return to their original color when they've stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeGhost

        void initializeGhost(GhostArea ghostArea,
                   MyStats stats,
                   java.awt.Color myColor)
        Called after class creation to initialize a Ghost. Use GhostArea.add(Actor) to add your ghost to the board. Do not put your Actor in the grid in this method. The GhostArea will call start(info.gridworld.grid.Grid<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>, info.gridworld.grid.Location) to when you should do this.
        Parameters:
        ghostArea - main ghostarea that holds all the ghosts
        stats - object to keep track and retrieve your own statistics see MyStats
        myColor - color to set yourself using Actor.setColor(Color)

      • start

        void start(info.gridworld.grid.Grid<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> grid,
         info.gridworld.grid.Location start)
        This method is called when this Ghost should enter the Maze. Use putSelfInGrid to add yourself to the designated location.
        Parameters:
        grid - the grid to add yourself too
        start - the starting location for this ghost

      • eaten

        void eaten()
        Called when the ghost is eaten by a Pac-Man You should remove yourself from the grid (if you haven't already), indicate that you've died, and add yourself back to the GhostArea

      • superPacMan

        void superPacMan(boolean start)
        Called when any Pac-Man eats a PowerPellet Ghosts should set their color to BLUE when a pacman is super and return to their original color when they've stopped.
        Parameters:
        start - will be true when a pacman turns super and false when no super pacmen are left.
